name: getscreen
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool maytapi_whatsapp.
Tool description: Send and receive messages from WhatsApp via Maytapi. It is a stable and reliable solution. See more:  https://maytapi.com/
API description: Fetches a screenshot of the screen in the current session for the given phone ID.

phone_id.description: The unique identifier of the phone whose screen session is to be captured.
